    id="sensor",
    index_pattern="sensor-*",
    rollup_index="sensor_rollup",
    cron="*/30 * * * * ?",
    page_size=1000,
    groups={
        "date_histogram": {
            "field": "timestamp",
            "fixed_interval": "1h",
            "delay": "7d"
        },
        "terms": {
            "fields": [
                "node"
            ]
        }
    },
    metrics=[
        {
            "field": "temperature",
            "metrics": [
                "min",
                "max",
                "sum"
            ]
        },

            "field": "voltage",
            "metrics": [
                "avg"
            ]
